title: Scarlet Chives - Scarlet Chives (2011) [320k]
description:
Scarlet Chives are a 6 piece band heralding from the up and coming Copenhagen music scene, Denmark, consisting of Maria Mortensen on lead vocals, John Greany and Brian Batz on guitars and synths, Rasmus Lindahl on piano and keyboards, Peter Esben on bass guitar, and Daniel Kolind on drums, percussion, and beat programming.
5 of the members grew up together on the beautiful island of Bornholm off the Swedish coast and played in various bands separately and together before creating the original template for Scarlet Chives called Majorian. They released an album that won over hearts and minds, and with their stage performances won some competitions and money allowing them to record an EP. This was to be the first collaboration with the indy producer Paul Schroeder, that went on to be called Ã¢â‚¬Å“the best indy record everÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ by one reviewer.
Happy but unfulfilled, the band recruited the rhythm skills of Daniel Kolind, whose background was more urban (he played with the highly influential Nobody Beats The Beats) and the Scarlet Chives sound was formed with Greany perfecting his soundscape guitars with Batz forging on with his angular guitar hooks and melodies (that have won him recognition in his own right as Sleep Party People), Lindahl adding his accomplished grand and purring keyboards, and Esben rooting it all together on bass. Mix this with the unique and beautiful sound of MortensenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s voice and what is created is a fragile organic yet thunderously climactic sound that transports the listener to a better place.
This world does need love and this is the band that delivers.
The band have just released their debut album, called Scarlet Chives, to critical acclaim, produced by the band and Paul Schroeder { Stone Roses, Verve, Campag Velocet } on the independent label Sureleaf.
